#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
#define F(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i <= (int)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i >= (int)(b); i--)

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
        freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif
    int T;
    ll X;
    double ans;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    ans = log10(2.71828182845904523536028747135266250);
    while(T--)
    {
        cin>>X;
        //cout<<X<<"\n";
        X = (double)X*ans;
        cout<<X+1<<"\n";
    }
    return 0;
}
